./.title: 开始
./.body: 介绍 Animate.css Animate.css是一个可在您的Web项目中使用的即用型跨浏览器动画库。非常适合强调，首页，滑块和引导注意的提示。 [!NOTE|label:注意] 新版本: v4.0.0 new DEMO版本： New @4.1.0 animate.compat.css Old @3.5.2 animate.min.css 引用CDN： JsDliver CDN Copyright © ijava.icu 2020 all right reserved，powered by Gitbook更新于： 2020-07-02

README/install.html.title: 安装和使用
README/install.html.body: 安装 NPM&YARN npm install animate.css --save yarn add animate.css CDN 使用 Using @keyframes CSS Custom Properties 实用程序类 延迟加载动画 delay-2s delay-3s delay-4s delay-5s 动画速度 slow slower fast faster 重复 repeat-1 repeat-2 repeat-3 从V3.x或者以下版本迁移 animate.min.css -> animate.compat.css Copyright © ijava.icu 2020 all right reserved，powered by Gitbook更新于： 2020-07-02

style.html.title: 样式
style.html.body: 所有样式 基础样式 bounce 弹跳v3+ flash 闪v3+ pulse 脉冲v3+ rubberBand 橡皮筋v3+ shakeX 摇动X方向v4+ shakeY 摇动Y方向v4+ headShake 头部摇动v3+ swing 摇摆v3+ tada 震动v3+ wobble 摇晃v3+ jello 果冻v3+ heartBeat 心跳v4+ 回入 backInDownv4+ backInLeftv4+ backInRightv4+ backInUpv4+ 回出 backOutDownv4+ backOutLeftv4+ backOutRightv4+ backOutUpv4+ 弹入 bounceInv3+ bounceInDownv3+ bounceInLeftv3+ bounceInRightv3+ bounceInUpv3+ 弹出 bounceOutv3+ bounceOutDownv3+ bounceOutLeftv3+ bounceOutRightv3+ bounceOutUpv3+ 淡入 fadeInv3+ fadeInDownv3+ fadeInDownBigv3+ fadeInLeftv3+ fadeInLeftBigv3+ fadeInRightv3+ fadeInRightBigv3+ fadeInUpv3+ fadeInUpBigv3+ fadeInTopLeftv3+ fadeInTopRightv3+ fadeInBottomLeftv3+ fadeInBottomRightv3+ 淡出v3+ fadeOutv3+ fadeOutDownv3+ fadeOutDownBigv3+ fadeOutLeftv3+ fadeOutLeftBigv3+ fadeOutRightv3+ fadeOutRightBigv3+ fadeOutUpv3+ fadeOutUpBigv3+ fadeOutTopLeftv3+ fadeOutTopRightv3+ fadeOutBottomLeftv3+ fadeOutBottomRightv3+ 翻转 flipv3+ flipInXv3+ flipInYv3+ flipOutXv3+ flipOutYv3+ 光速 lightSpeedInRightv4+ lightSpeedInLeftv4+ lightSpeedOutRightv4+ lightSpeedOutLeftv4+ 旋入 rotateInv3+ rotateInDownLeftv3+ rotateInDownRightv3+ rotateInUpLeftv3+ rotateInUpRightv3+ 旋出 rotateOutv3+ rotateOutDownLeftv3+ rotateOutDownRightv3+ rotateOutUpLeftv3+ rotateOutUpRightv3+ 特殊 hingev3+ jackInTheBoxv4+ rollInv3+ rollOutv3+ 缩入 zoomInv3+ zoomInDownv3+ zoomInLeftv3+ zoomInRightv3+ zoomInUpv3+ 缩出 zoomOutv3+ zoomOutDownv3+ zoomOutLeftv3+ zoomOutRightv3+ zoomOutUpv3+ 滑入 slideInDownv4+ slideInLeftv4+ slideInRightv4+ slideInUpv4+ 滑出 slideOutDownv4+ slideOutLeftv4+ slideOutRightv4+ slideOutUpv4+ Copyright © ijava.icu 2020 all right reserved，powered by Gitbook更新于： 2020-07-02

style/basic.html.title: 基础样式
style/basic.html.body: 基本样式 bounce flash pulse rubberBand shakeX shakeY headShake swing tada wobble jello heartBeat [!NOTE|label:注意] V3.x版本部分不适用 bounce bounce [!TIP|style:flat|label:Code] Old bounce New bounce flash flash [!TIP|style:flat|label:Code] Old flash New flash pulse pulse [!TIP|style:flat|label:Code] Old pulse New pulse rubberBand rubberBand [!TIP|style:flat|label:Code] Old rubberBand New rubberBand shakeX shakeX [!TIP|style:flat|label:Code] Old（不适用） shakeX New shakeX shakeY shakeY [!TIP|style:flat|label:Code] Old（不适用） shakeY New shakeY headShake headShake [!TIP|style:flat|label:Code] Old headShake New headShake swing swing [!TIP|style:flat|label:Code] Old swing New swing tada tada [!TIP|style:flat|label:Code] Old tada New tada wobble wobble [!TIP|style:flat|label:Code] Old wobble New wobble jello jello [!TIP|style:flat|label:Code] Old jello New jello heartBeat heartBeat [!TIP|style:flat|label:Code] Old不适用 heartBeat New heartBeat Copyright © ijava.icu 2020 all right reserved，powered by Gitbook更新于： 2020-07-02
